sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均可表示"特别地"之意。
means: specially ： 着重为做某事而"专门地、特意地"，相当于on purpose。
especially ： 较多地用于正式文体，侧重超过其它全部，突出到"特别地"的程度，相当于in particular。
particularly ： 用来指同类中特别突出的一个。

de分开+part部分,分开→部分分开→离开
im无+partial有偏见的→无偏见的

part部分,分开→n.部分, 局部 v.分开

sentences.en: He isn't particularly clever.
sentences.cn: 他并不特别聪明。</seg>

entry.def: You use particularly to indicate that what you are saying applies especially to one thing or situation.

example.ex: Keep your office space looking good, particularly your desk...
example.tran: 保持办公环境的整洁，尤其是你的桌子。

example.ex: More local employment will be created, particularly in service industries...
example.tran: 当地会创造出更多的就业机会，尤其是服务行业。

entry.def: Particularly means more than usual or more than other things.

example.tran: 进展情况格外令人失望。

example.ex: I particularly liked the wooden chests and chairs.
example.tran: 我格外喜欢木箱子和木椅子。

means.word_mean: 1. to a distinctly greater extent or degree than is common;

sentences.sentence: "an especially (or specially) cautious approach to the danger"

means.word_mean: 2. specifically or especially distinguished from others;

sentences.sentence: "trace major population movements for the Pueblo groups in particular"
"everyone has a moment in history which belongs particularly to him"- John Knowles

sentences.cn: 特别好 / 重要 / 有用
sentences.en: particularly good/important/useful

sentences.cn: 交通状况很差，尤其是在市中心。
sentences.en: Traffic is bad, particularly in the city centre.

sentences.cn: 我很欣赏那场比赛，特别是下半场。
sentences.en: I enjoyed the play, particularly the second half.

sentences.cn: 讲座并不特别精彩。
sentences.en: The lecture was not particularly (= not very) interesting.

sentences.cn: “你玩得开心吗？”“不很开心。”
sentences.en: ‘Did you enjoy it? ’ ‘No, not particularly (= not very much) . ’

sentences.cn: 保持办公环境的整洁，尤其是你的桌子。
sentences.en: Keep your office space looking good, particularly your desk...

sentences.cn: 当地会创造出更多的就业机会，尤其是服务行业。
sentences.en: More local employment will be created, particularly in service industries...

sentences.cn: 进展情况格外令人失望。
sentences.en: Progress has been particularly disap-pointing...

sentences.cn: 我格外喜欢木箱子和木椅子。
sentences.en: I particularly liked the wooden chests and chairs.

sentences.cn: 他的头脑并不十分复杂.
sentences.en: He had not a particularly complex mind.

sentences.cn: 我们特别感谢他的及时帮助.
sentences.en: We are particularly grateful to him for his timely help.

sentences.cn: 他因年高而特别受人尊敬.
sentences.en: He was particularly respected for his great age.

sentences.cn: 美国政府提倡给人们喝咖啡休息时间, 当时是提高士气——特别是对那些从事国防工作的人员而言.
sentences.en: Washington advocated the coffee break, then, as a morale builder — particularly for the defense workers.

sentences.cn: 他喜欢对任何人, 尤其是年轻人以居高临下的姿态讲话.
sentences.en: He talks down to everyone, particularly young people.

sentences.cn: 从没有人认为他统治的时期特别值得关注.
sentences.en: His reign has never been considered particularly noteworthy.

sentences.cn: 这些日子我们特别忙.
sentences.en: We've been particularly busy these days.

sentences.cn: 我们觉得他采用的那些例证启发性不是特别大。
sentences.en: We didn't find the examples he used particularly illuminating.

sentences.cn: 他视力不好，算不上是一个出色的射手。
sentences.en: He was not a particularly good shot because of his eyesight.

sentences.cn: 肝脏和肾脏富含维生素A。
sentences.en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.

sentences.cn: 他认为在圣诞节这天开始释放人质尤为讽刺。
sentences.en: He called it particularly cynical to begin releasing the hostages on Christmas Day.

sentences.cn: 本地电话资费贵得出奇。
sentences.en: Charges for local telephone calls are particularly outrageous.

sentences.cn: 该联盟尤其关注海外的产品货源。
sentences.en: The union is particularly concerned at the sourcing of products abroad.

sentences.cn: 这些孩子让她吃足了苦头，特别是那些年龄大一点的男孩子。
sentences.en: The children give her hell, particularly the older boys.

sentences.cn: 保持办公环境的整洁，尤其是你的桌子。
sentences.en: Keep your office space looking good, particularly your desk.

sentences.cn: 远程学习的灵活性对于日理万机的经理人来说特别适合。
sentences.en: The flexibility of distance learning would be particularly suited to busy managers.

sentences.cn: 当地会创造出更多的就业机会，尤其是服务行业。
sentences.en: More local employment will be created, particularly in service industries.

sentences.cn: 特别好 / 重要 / 有用
sentences.en: particularly good/important/useful

sentences.cn: 我很欣赏那场比赛，特别是下半场。
sentences.en: I enjoyed the play, particularly the second half.

sentences.cn: 讲座并不特别精彩。
sentences.en: The lecture was not particularly (= not very) interesting.

sentences.cn: 整个晚上,有一位男士特别健谈，不停地发表自己的看法，并且讲述一些奇闻趣事，而他身旁的妻子则安静地坐在沙发上。
sentences.en: Throughout the evening,one man had been particularly talkative,frequently offering ideas and anecdotes while his wife sat silently beside him on the couch.

sentences.cn: 特罗尼克认为,仅仅因为孩子没有从数字产品上学到东西并不意味着它没有任何价值一特别是如果它能让父母有时间去洗澡,做家务或只是暂时离开孩子休息一下
sentences.en: Tronick believes that just because a child isn't learning from the screen doesn't mean there's no value to it—— particularly if it gives parents time to have a shower, do housework or simply have a break from their child.

sentences.cn: 垃圾场的食物并不是特别诱人，甚至也不安全。

sentences.cn: 这可能是件坏事，特别是在上班时。

sentences.cn: 通信视线是无线技术中的另一个问题.
sentences.en: Line of sight is another issue in wireless technology.

sentences.cn: 来回上下班需要时间和精力 ( 交通上的耗时特别让人泄气 ).
sentences.en: Commuting takes time and energy ( spending time in traffic is particularly draining ).

sentences.cn: 澳大利亚和加拿大在争取有才能的移民方面特别积极.
sentences.en: Australia and Canada have become particularly aggressive in the competition for talented immigrants.

sentences.cn: 这是一家收费非常昂贵的旅馆, 而且也不是特别舒适.
sentences.en: It was a very expensive hotel, and not particularly comfortable at that.

sentences.cn: 新的程序应该对大公司特别有好处.
sentences.en: The new process should be particularly advantageous to big companies.

sentences.cn: 我并不是一个特别快乐的孩子, 和其他十几岁的孩子们一样, 我沉溺于自己的痛苦之中.
sentences.en: I was not a particularly happy child, and like most teenagers, I reveled in my angst.

sentences.cn: 我特别喜欢这个.
sentences.en: I particularly like this one.

sentences.cn: 猫尿味: 刺激性的甚至侵略性的气味,特别是出现在一些长相思葡萄酒.
sentences.en: Cats pee: Pungent, even aggressive, aroma found particularly in some Sauvignon Blanc wines.

sentences.cn: 如果可能, 提及特别有帮助的一个人.
sentences.en: If possible, single out a particularly helpful person.

sentences.cn: 这句话对于土木工程或房屋结构来说是特别恰当的.
sentences.en: This is particularly true for civil engineering or building structures.

sentences.cn: 邓小平主任能够光临,我感到特别高兴.
